Package javelin.controller.action.world

Class WorldMove

  • java.lang.Object
    • javelin.controller.action.world.WorldAction
      • javelin.controller.action.world.WorldMove
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionDescription
    public class WorldMove
extends WorldAction
    Makes a movement on the overworld or Dungeon. TODO WorldScreen hierarchy should be refactored into proper Battle / Dungeon / World screens. TODO perform(WorldScreen) needs refactoring after 2.0
    Author:
    alex
    See Also:
    Javelin.getDayPeriod()

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static boolean isleavingplace
      TODO remove, hack
      static float MOVETARGET
      Ideally a move should always be 6 hours in a worst-case scenario (the time of a period), so as to avoid a move taking longer than a period, which could confuse Hazards.

      Represents time spent on resting, eating, sleeping, etc.
      static float TIMECOST

    • Field Detail

      • NORMALMARCH

        public static final float NORMALMARCH
        Represents time spent on resting, eating, sleeping, etc. TODO forced march
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MOVETARGET

        public static final float MOVETARGET
        Ideally a move should always be 6 hours in a worst-case scenario (the time of a period), so as to avoid a move taking longer than a period, which could confuse Hazards.
        See Also:
        TIMECOST, Constant Field Values

      • TIMECOST

        public static final float TIMECOST
        How much time it takes to walk a single square with speed 30 (~30mph, normal human speed). Calculation of worst case scenario (which should take 6 hours): 6 * 15/30ft (slow races) * .5 (bad terrain)
        See Also:
        Monster#gettopspeed(), MOVETARGET, NORMALMARCH, Constant Field Values
